page.title: 16A day in the life of.. young
page.content: My name is Heather Greenwood and I am 11 years old.I usually get up at 8.00am and get ready for school.My school is called Alexandra Parade and is for primary children aged 5 to 12. Lessons begin at 9am and include English, Arithmetic and Art. Sometimes we go swimming in Whitehill Pool and once every 3 weeks the local minister Mr Campbell comes and we have a service. I like my school and my favourite subject is Arithmetic. When school finishes at 3.30pm I go home, do any homework I might have and then I go out on my bike with my friends. After tea I sometimes go out to play in the court behind my tenement building or perhaps if it is wet I might stay in to watch television. I like Dynasty best. Then after my supper it's off to bed at round about 10pm.
